page.title: 11Colburn : an introduction.
page.content: {Colburn}is a{Richmondshire}District Council housing estate,part of which is on the east edge of this block.Most of the houses on the western fringe of the estate were built 30 years ago , but newer private housing has appeared on both sides of the lane which leads down to{Colburn Village.}Most of the land around{Colburn}is farmland, although the{Army}does own parts of it.{Catterick Garrison}itself, one kilometre WSW of{Colburn,}provides a few jobs for{Colburn}residents,but a good many people travel to{Richmond}or {Darlington}for work.At this time, a high proportion of{Colburn}people are unemployed,particularly the younger members of the community.The{Easby side of the{River Swale}has become more concerned with Tourism,with the {Brompton}road providing a popular route from the{A1}to{Richmond.
